name: Déjà Drift (Arlington "AJ" Griffith, rylanc9, linkoid)
description:
Stuck alone on a retro-futuristic racetrack, your only choice is to drift.  Get as many points as possible before time is up, and then do it again and again...  But wait, there's someone else here?  And why does the path they're taking seem so familiar?

For the month of December 2021, a demo version will be available on this page showcasing two different levels, including the original game jam level (with minor tweaks!) and a new level.

This is the full version of the game.  Check https://bonbonaj.itch.io/deja-drift-jam-ver for the game jam version.

For more frequent updates, to join alpha testing, or even just to chat, make sure to join our Discord server!  https://discord.gg/mHUUHZ7BhG
